title: Sunset Dreams T-Shirt
description:
Hand-painted cotton t-shirt featuring a vibrant sunset gradient with palm tree silhouettes. Each brushstroke is carefully applied to create a unique wearable art piece. The colors blend from deep purple to orange and pink, creating a dreamy tropical vibe.

Material: 100% organic cotton
Care: Hand wash cold, air dry

This is a one-of-a-kind piece - no two are exactly alike!
size: M (can be made in other sizes)

title: Abstract Ocean Canvas
description:
Original acrylic painting on 16x20 inch canvas. This piece captures the movement and energy of ocean waves through bold brushstrokes and a vibrant color palette of blues, teals, and white foam.

Inspired by the powerful beauty of the sea, this artwork brings a sense of calm and energy to any space. The textured application of paint creates depth and dimension.

Canvas is gallery-wrapped and ready to hang. Signed on the back by the artist.
